speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: Hi Mark, I'm doing well, thanks. What's this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling about your outstanding balance with ABC Credit Card. Can you confirm your last name for me?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Mr. Johnson. I see you have a balance of $450. Can we discuss payment options?

speaker: Customer
text: I wasn't aware of that amount. Can you tell me more about the charges?

speaker: Agent
text: Sure! The charges include recent purchases and some fees. Would you like to set up a payment plan?

speaker: Customer
text: I would consider that, but I need to review my statement first.

speaker: Agent
text: Absolutely, I can send you a detailed statement. Would you prefer it via email or postal mail?

speaker: Agent
text: Got it! I'll send that over. Just for confirmation, can you provide your email address?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Mr. Johnson. I’ll send the statement shortly. Anything else I can assist you with?

speaker: Customer
text: No, that's all for now. Thanks for your help!

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! Have a great day!
